I want to be an Investor!

string.name: terms_and_conditions
string.p: These Terms and General Conditions constitute a legally binding agreement made between you, whether personally or on behalf of an entity ("you") and FundMe App ("Company", "we", "us", or, "our"), concerning your access to and use of the FundMe App mobile application. We are registered in Canada and have our office registered at 700 Royal Ave, New Westminster V3M 5Z5. You agree that by accessing the App, you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all of these Term and General conditions. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH ALL OF THESE TERMS AND GENERAL CONDITIONS, THEN YOU ARE EXPRESSLY PROHIBITED FROM USING THE APP AND YOU MUST DISCONTINUE USE IMMEDIATELY.

We reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to make changes or modifications to these Terms and General Conditions, and you waive any right to receive specific notice of each such change. Please ensure that you check the applicable Terms every time you use our App so that you understand which Terms apply. You will be subject to, and will be deemed to have been made aware of and to have accepted, the changes in any revised Terms and General Conditions by your continued use of the App after the date such revised Terms and General Conditions are posted.
The App is intended for users who are at least 18 years old. Persons under the age of 18 are not permitted to use or register to this App.

Unless otherwise indicated, the App is our property and all source code, databases, functionality, software, App designs, text, photographs, and graphics on the App and the trademarks, service marks, and logos contained are owned or controlled by us or licenced to us.

By using the App, you represent and warrant that: (1) all registration information you submit will be true, accurate, current, and complete; (2) you will maintain the accuracy of such information and promptly update such registration information as necessary; (3) you have the legal capacity and you agree to comply with these Terms and General Conditions; (4) you are not a minor in the jurisdiction in which you reside; (5) you will no access the App through automated or non-human means, whether through a bot, script or otherwise; (6) you will not use the App for any illegal or unauthorized purpose; and (7) your use of the App will not violate any applicable law or regulation. If you provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current, or incomplete, we have the right to suspend or terminate your account and refuse any and all current or future use of the App.

You may be required to register with the App. You agree to keep your password confidential and will be responsible for all use of your account and password. We reserve the right to remove, reclaim, or change a username you select if we determine, in our sole discretion, that such username is inappropriate, obscene, or otherwise objectionable.

Borrowers Fees: FundMe charges a progressive origination fee of 2% of the lend amount from $1000 to $4999, 3% of the lend amount from $5000 to $14999, and 4% of the lend amount from $15000 to $25000 to the borrowers.
Also, charges a late payment fee as percent of transaction size of 10% of unpaid installment amount (per unpaid installment)
Finally, charges a unsuccessful payment fee as flat rate of $50 every time no funds on bank account or problem to charge.
Investors Fee: FundMe charges a service fee which is a % of the unpaid principal balance at the end of each month, deducted from loan repayments. The % depends on the risk level of the borrower the investor is willing to finance. As follows:
High risk: 0.125%
Moderate high risk: 0.128%
Low high risk: 0.151%
Medium risk: 0.166%
Low medium risk: 0.201%
Low risk: 0.221%
Moderate low risk: 0.244%
Lower low risk: 0.268%
In order to borrow/invest you may be required to do direct deposits to our FundMe bank account allowing us deduct the require fees and therefore, transfer the net loan to the borrower and net earnings to the investor.
You agree to provide current, complete, and accurate bank account information during the registration phase. You further agree to promptly update account and payment information, including email address, account number, institution number and transit number, so that we can process the payments and calculate the net amounts. All transactions shall be in Canadian dollars.
You agree to pay all fees as mentioned above, and you authorize us to charge/deposit you depending on the profile chosen and type of transactions made.
We reserve the right to correct any errors or mistakes in fees values and therefore, deductions amount. We also reserve the right to refuse any transaction through the App.

All transactions are non-refundable. You can cancel a transaction at any time by clicking reject button at the moment of visualizing the summary of the loan proposal (borrowers) or refusing to complete a deal (investors).

We will maintain certain data that you transmit to the App for the purpose of managing the performance of the App, as well as data relating to your use of the App. Although we perform regular routine backups of data, you are solely responsible for all data that you transmit or that related to any activity you have undertaken using the App. You agree that we shall have no liability to you for any loss or corruption of any such data, and you hereby waive any right of action against us arising from any such loss or corruption of such data.

In order to resolve a complaint regarding the App or to receive further information regarding the use of the App, please contact us at:
FundMe App 700 Royal Ave New Westminster V3M 5Z5 Canada Phone: (778) 251-8731 Email: fundmeapp@support.ca

resources.string: (Please, you must fill all the questions)
Purpose of Borrowing (Choose one option only):
Agree to pay 10% of unpaid installment amount (per unpaid installment) if incur in late payment
Agree to pay 50 cad every time no funds on bank account or problem to charge is identified
Do you want to complete the deal?
